content: in the stitches by doing this even if things start to loosen up it s fixable and things won t unravel completely it s extra important for baby and child proofing making the work more durable even for pieces that aren t sewed on don t cut the yarn hide it down or inside the work wherever possible ©2023aybeecreates lankyfoxcrochetpattern head orange=o white=w x1 1 o in magic_ring
